verses.name: Jeremiah 23:9
verses.text: Mine heart within me is broken because of the prophets; all my bones shake; I am like a drunken man, and like a man whom wine hath overcome, because of the Lord, and because of the words of his holiness.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:10
verses.text: For the land is full of adulterers; for because of swearing the land mourneth; the pleasant places of the wilderness are dried up, and their course is evil, and their force is not right.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:11
verses.text: For both prophet and priest are profane; yea, in my house have I found their wickedness, saith the Lord.
